## Code

Library Statements

```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

Import Data

```{r}
mtcars_df <- read.csv(here("data/mtcars.csv"))
head(mtcars_df)
```

## Graphs

Scatter Plot of Weight vs Mpg

```{r}
ggplot(mtcars_df, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Weight vs MPG",
       x = "Weight (1000 lbs)",
       y = "Miles per Gallon")
```

Scatter Plot of Weight vs Mpg by Amount of Cylinders

```{r}
ggplot(mtcars_df, aes(x = wt, y = mpg, color = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  labs(title = "Weight vs MPG by Cylinders",
       x = "Weight (1000 lbs)",
       y = "Miles per Gallon",
       color = "Cylinders")
```

Histogram of Miles per Gallon

```{r}
ggplot(mtcars_df, aes(x = mpg)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 2, fill = "steelblue", color = "black") +
  labs(title = "Number of Cars with Miles Per Gallon",
       x = "Miles per Gallon",
       y = "Number of Cars")
```

Separating data column make_model into make and model

```{r}
mtcars_df <- mtcars_df %>%
  separate(make_model, into = c("make", "model"), sep = " ", extra = "merge")

head(mtcars_df)
```

Box Plot with Jitter of Mpg by Make

```{r}
ggplot(mtcars_df, aes(x = reorder(make, mpg, FUN = median), y = mpg)) +
  geom_boxplot(outlier.shape = NA, fill = "lightgray") +   # boxplot
  geom_jitter(width = 0.2, aes(color = make), size = 2) +  # jittered points
  labs(title = "Miles per Gallon by Make",
       x = "Make",
       y = "Miles per Gallon") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) # rotate labels
```
